name: Pet of the Week – Frito
description: This week's Pet of the Week is Frito, a young, energetic husky mix from our Carlsbad shelter. Frito is looking for a new forever home where he can play with all sorts of different toys outside and have his fur brushed.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: This week’s Pet of the Week is Frito, a young, energetic husky mix from our Carlsbad shelter. Frito is looking for a new forever home where he can play with all sorts of different toys outside and have his fur brushed. If you are interested in adopting Frito, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
